classification.notes: Classification describes what LL-37 is and the general domain where it appears.

status.human_use_note: Status reflects how LL-37 appears in clinical literature and/or real-world contexts. This is descriptive only.

risk.rationale: Risk scoring reflects evidence quality, adverse-signal plausibility, and uncertainty. Limited data increases uncertainty.

overview.title: What it is
overview.text: LL-37 is a bioactive compound discussed in research and/or clinical contexts. This entry summarizes what it is, what it is studied for, and key evidence limitations without providing protocols.

observed_exposure_ranges.notes: Descriptive only. Observed in studies; not instructions.

developmental_risk_block.text: Developmental risk is flagged due to limited adolescent data and uncertain long-term effects. Endocrine, growth, neurodevelopmental, and metabolic setpoints may be sensitive to perturbation. This section is descriptive only; uncertainty is explicitly acknowledged.

meta.notes_seed: Human antimicrobial peptide (cathelicidin); studied in immune/skin contexts; avoid protocol claims and do not present as approved.
